title: 08/04/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 08/04/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP is joined by Reds All-Star Joey Votto for an awesome interview to discuss his home run streak, amongst many other topics. Pro Football Focus' Steve Palazzolo calls in to explain their WR corps rankings. And Frank Isola recaps all the moves made in NBA Free Agency thus far.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
